creator: NZN Labs Inc.
descriptionHtml:
The LITPro MX App works with the LITPro hardware module to help athletes measure and improve track performance. Whether actively competing or just training to meet personal goals, LITPro MX helps athletes dial in their metrics for the most important aspects of the sport. LITPro has been tested, proven, and is currently being used by many of the top teams and athletes in the sport.

The LITPro MX App features the following:
- Automatic lap and segment times on any outdoor track to within 1/20th of AMA official lap times
- Customizable track segments, or use the segments designed by the pros *for most public tracks, and some private tracks*
- Integrate a heart rate monitor for advanced heart rate training and analysis
- See your lines side by side on custom LITPro hi-def aerial track maps *available on many So-cal tracks and coming soon to more*
- Check out Lap99, the most intuitive way of looking at your theoretical fastest lap based on all of the segment times from your session

Whether you need to work on scrubbing so you can spend more time on the ground, or are just trying to work your way up to hit that double, this App will help you measure and improve like you never thought possible.

Learn from every lap with LITPro. To get started make sure you check out our website to get yourself kitted out with the most advanced technology in MX that makes all of this possible.

LITPro Validation:
- over 30,000 hours of professional athlete track time
- over 12,000 miles of airtime used to tune LITPro algorithms
- over 50,000 miles of Supercross and Motocross laps to advance LITPro detection and analytics

This app uses location services while the app is backgrounded, but only while you are actively viewing a rider's session.

Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.
descriptionShort: Advanced MX Lap Timer

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
To encourage your much appreciated feedback, we've added a link to the home page of the app that directs you to a webpage built for submitting feedback.

Some rider's sessions would consistently cause the app to crash. This was due to a failure to round digits correctly, and this error should no longer occur.

Past updates have logged the user out of the app. Going forward, you will not be logged out automatically.

Improved performance of home page and sessions page.

descriptionShort: Advanced MX Lap Timer

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
LITPro MX has finally made it's way to the Android platform!
We are absolutely thrilled to introduce LITPro to riders who have not yet experienced riding with lap times.

Note: LITPro premium features are not included in this release, but we are working diligently to create and release this experience for Android users on a later date.

New since previous Beta release:

Tab navigation
Notifications
List of user's personal GPS devices
Stability + aesthetic improvements

title: LITPro MX

creator: NZN Labs Inc.
descriptionHtml:
LITPro is the best training tool for motocross riders in the digital era. Get lap times, segment times, and other personalized riding insights in one powerful app. LITPro is the most efficient way to lower your lap time quickly on the same day.
Compatible GPS Recording Devices
• Polar GPS Watches
• Garmin GPS Watches
Core Features
• Automatic lap and segment times at any outdoor track worldwide
• Duration
• Speed
• Distance
• Global challenges
Analysis
• Lap 99-theoretical fastest lap
• Consistency score
• Integrated heart rate (optional)
• Data sharing with other athletes
• And more...
Learn from every lap with LITPro.
This app uses location services while the app is backgrounded, but only while you are actively viewing a rider’s session.
Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.
For more information, visit: https://app.litprolive.com/
descriptionShort: Advanced MX Lap Timer

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Now taking advantage of Google's in app purchase platform for subscriptions. You can now rely on greater transparency and control on what you pay for and when. We’ve also made some UI improvements to some of the account handling screens, with more exciting features on the way. This is one of our biggest app releases yet and we hope you enjoy it!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Important updates:
- Connecting accounts with other riders can now be done in the app!

- Aesthetic improvements
- Minor bug fixes and performance improvements

title: LITPro MX

creator: NZN Labs Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Why is LITPro better than the competition?

1. Proven and tested by professional athletes for 10+ years
2. Personalized riding insights and recommendations after every ride
3. Combines your laps to show you your possible fastest lap line on the track

LITPRO FEATURES:
• Track your lap and segments and monitor them over time
• Custom track configuration
• Personal recommendations to improve after every session
• Heart rate data
• Ability to share your lap data with your buddies and participate in global challenges

ADVANCED GPS FEATURES
• GPS Playback with Color-Coded Speed
• Acceleration and declaration breakdown
• Corner analysis
• Gate drop analysis
• Target specific corners to get faster
• Airtime analytics
• Calculation of lap and segment times

OTHER FEATURES
• Track leaderboards
• Track consistency over time
• Motocross stopwatch
• Target potential
• Lap comparison
• Personal riding feed
• Extensive statistics
• Track weather conditions
• Rider profile with picture and name
• Motocross tips
• And more...

GPS RECORDING DEVICES
• XGPS 160
• Polar GPS Watches
• Garmin GPS watches
• GoPro Cameras
• HDGPS


Learn from every lap with LITPro.

Privacy Policy: https://app.litprolive.com/legal/privacy

Terms of Service: https://app.litprolive.com/legal/terms

For more information, visit: https://litprolive.com/

NOTE: This app uses location services while the app is backgrounded, but only while you are actively logging a session. Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.
descriptionShort: THE ONLY GPS LAP TIMER PROVEN TO SHAVE SECONDS OFF YOUR LAP TIME

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Use your mobile device to record your ride and create a session! This release is foreshadowing support for more advanced GPS devices and a more rich in-app experience. We hope you enjoy!

Other updates:
- Connecting with other LITPro riders can now be done in the app
- Some users encountered an app crash when we delivered a notification. This will no longer be an issue.
- Minor fixes and performance improvements

descriptionShort: LITPro MX Lap Timer transforms your phone into an advanced motocross lap timer

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
The unlimited LITPro experience is finally here!

- Relive your day at the track with the LITPro lap replay
- Compare your laps with your friends laps to create a fun rivalry, and to see where your gaining time on the track
- You will also soon be able to view a leaderboard for your favorite track - available at the end of the week!

descriptionShort: LITPro MX Lap Timer transforms your phone into an advanced motocross lap timer

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Happy Holidays!
This release includes:
- a light visual touchup and rebranding
- new interactive screens to help those that are just getting started
- several minor fixes that help the app to appear less glitchy
- the ability to add notes to your session, and view specific segments from your sessions.

If you notice any issues with the app, we'd love your feedback. We're actively trying to make this experience better.

Cheers!

• GPS Playback with Color-Coded Speed
• Acceleration and declaration breakdown
• Corner analysis
• Gate drop analysis
• Target specific corners to get faster
• Airtime analytics
• Calculation of lap and segment times

OTHER FEATURES
• Track leaderboards
• Track consistency over time
• Motocross stopwatch
• Target potential
• Lap comparison
• Personal riding feed
• Extensive statistics
• Track weather conditions

• Motocross tips

GPS RECORDING DEVICES
• XGPS 160
• Polar GPS Watches
• Garmin GPS watches
• GoPro Cameras

Learn from every lap with LITPro.

Terms of Service: https://app.litprolive.com/legal/terms

descriptionShort: LITPro MX Lap Timer transforms your phone into an advanced motocross lap timer

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Happy New Year!
Here are a few recent updates:
- a light visual touchup and rebranding
- new interactive screens to help those that are just getting started
- several minor fixes that make the app more user friendly
- the ability to add notes to your session, and view specific segments from your sessions.

If you notice any issues with the app, we'd love your feedback. We're actively trying to make this experience better.

Cheers!

title:
LITPro - GPS Lap Timer
3.9.4

creator: NZN Labs Inc.
descriptionHtml:
The LITPro - GPS Lap Timer app is your one-stop source for GPS lap times and other riding data. Whether you're training for a race, having fun with friends, or just logging laps, LITPro provides the information and inspiration you need to reach your riding goals.

After you pair a compatible GPS device (RaceBox Mini S, Garmin GPS watch, or Polar GPS watch) to your LITPro account, you can review your lap times. LITPro excels at telling you where you're gaining or losing time on the track. Plus, you can review personalized riding insights and recommendations after every session to help you improve. It's a personal riding coach explicitly designed for motocross, supercross, downhill MTB, Surron and e-bike tracks.

With LITPro - GPS Lap Timer you can:

• Track lap times, segment times, personal records, and consistency score over time
• Compare theoretical fastest lap (Lap99) to actual fastest lap
• Create custom track configurations on any outdoor courses worldwide
• Playback and compare different lap route lines in realtime
• Improve your corners using corner analysis
• Share your riding data with friends and challenge them on global leaderboards
• Review trends in health metrics like heart rate
• Study acceleration and deceleration metrics
• Analyze reaction time and gate drops
• Manage a fleet of Mini S's as a coach
• Jump detection and airtime analytics

Other Features
• Track leaderboards
• Lap comparison
• Track consistency over time
• Motocross stopwatch
• Target potential
• Personal riding feed
• Track weather conditions
• Rider profile
• Video Analysis
• And more...

List of Compatible GPS Receivers
• RaceBox Mini S (25Hz)
• Garmin GPS watches (Garmin Connect) (1Hz)
• Polar GPS Watches (Polar Flow) (1Hz)
• Smartphone (1Hz)

Learn from every lap with LITPro.

Learn more about compatible GPS devices and how they work with the LITPro - GPS Lap Timer app at litprolive.com.

Privacy Policy: https://app.litprolive.com/legal/privacy
Terms of Service: https://app.litprolive.com/legal/terms

Note: This app uses location services while the app is backgrounded, but only while you are actively logging a session. Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.
descriptionShort: GPS lap timer and personal riding coach on your smartphone

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Now supporting Spanish, Italian, French, and German!
- Compare your laps against the fastest riders at the track
- Support for precision GPS device, RaceBox
- Record laps with just your phone
- View ongoing Global LITPro challenges

If you notice any issues with the app, we'd love your feedback. We update the app weekly to make the experience even better!

title:
LITPro - GPS Lap Timer
3.10.3

creator: NZN Labs Inc.
descriptionHtml:
The LITPro - GPS Lap Timer app is your one-stop source for GPS lap times and other riding data. Whether you're training for a race, having fun with friends, or just logging laps, LITPro provides the information and inspiration you need to reach your riding goals.

After you pair a compatible GPS device (RaceBox Mini S, Garmin GPS watch, or Polar GPS watch) to your LITPro account, you can review your lap times. LITPro excels at telling you where you're gaining or losing time on the track. Plus, you can review personalized riding insights and recommendations after every session to help you improve. It's a personal riding coach explicitly designed for motocross, supercross, downhill MTB, Surron and e-bike tracks.

With LITPro - GPS Lap Timer you can:

• Track lap times, segment times, personal records, and consistency score over time
• Compare theoretical fastest lap (Lap99) to actual fastest lap
• Create custom track configurations on any outdoor courses worldwide
• Playback and compare different lap route lines in realtime
• Improve your corners using corner analysis
• Share your riding data with friends and challenge them on global leaderboards
• Review trends in health metrics like heart rate
• Study acceleration and deceleration metrics
• Analyze reaction time and gate drops
• Manage a fleet of Mini S's as a coach
• Jump detection and airtime analytics

Other Features
• Track leaderboards
• Lap comparison
• Track consistency over time
• Motocross stopwatch
• Target potential
• Personal riding feed
• Track weather conditions
• Rider profile
• Video Analysis
• And more...

List of Compatible GPS Receivers
• RaceBox Mini S (25Hz)
• Garmin GPS watches (Garmin Connect) (1Hz)
• Polar GPS Watches (Polar Flow) (1Hz)
• Smartphone (1Hz)

Learn from every lap with LITPro.

Learn more about compatible GPS devices and how they work with the LITPro - GPS Lap Timer app at litprolive.com.

Privacy Policy: https://app.litprolive.com/legal/privacy
Terms of Service: https://app.litprolive.com/legal/terms

Note: This app uses location services while the app is backgrounded, but only while you are actively logging a session. Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.
